#summary List of features
#labels Featured
----
= Monitoring and Management =
|| || *Monitor* || *Manage* ||
|| *Contexts* || list, status, attributes/values, request count, session count || start, stop, restart, deploy, undeploy ||
|| *Sessions* || list, status, attributes/values, last-accessed IP, search || expire, remove attributes ||
|| *Data Sources* || list, list grouped by JDBC URL, usage (max/established/busy connections) || reset ||
|| *JSPs* || list, view source || compile selected, pre-compile on deployment, view generated servlet source, delete "work" directory ||
|| *Threads* || list, status || kill (stop hanging requests) ||
|| *Logs* || list, download, tail in real-time || ||
|| *Connectors* || status, real-time usage charts || ||
|| *Cluster* || status, real-time traffic charts || ||
|| *System* || properties, OS details || ||
|| *JVM* || details, real-time memory usage charts || advise GC ||
|| *Java Service Wrapper* || status || restart JVM ||
|| *Quick Check* || view || ||

= Compatibility =
  * *Java:* 1.4, 1.5, 6
  * *Tomcat:* 5.0, 5.5, 6.0 (partial)
  * *JBoss:* 3.2, 4.0
  * *Data Sources:* DBCP, C3P0, Oracle
  * *Logs:* JDK (java.util), log4j, commons-logging
